commit.message:
tree-ssa-dse.c (dse_possible_dead_store_p): Remove dead code.

2008-05-14  Richard Guenther  <rguenther@suse.de>

	* tree-ssa-dse.c (dse_possible_dead_store_p): Remove dead code.
	Make sure to register the store if the use is a PHI_NODE.

From-SVN: r135298
